channel.title: Ancient Spellbook Teleport Lag
channel.description:
[s]Hello, I when a user clicks a teleport on the ancient spellbook, the animation executes, and then the player goes invisible for approximately 10 seconds. During this 10 seconds the player cannot move or do anything. I think it may have to do with the Ancient teleport animation lasting for too long. If this is the case, how do I shorten that length? If it isn't, any help to fix this issue is appreciated.[/s]
[b]EDIT:[/b] Sorry, I found the fix for this problem, and it is in fact a server issue not a client issue.
I had to change c.teleEndAnimation = 0; to c.teleEndAnimation = 1; in PlayerAssistant.java

item.title: Ancient Spellbook Teleport Lag
item.dc:creator: @Gypsy Gypsy
item.description:
@Gypsy wrote:

Hello, I when a user clicks a teleport on the ancient spellbook, the animation executes, and then the player goes invisible for approximately 10 seconds. During this 10 seconds the player cannot move or do anything. I think it may have to do with the Ancient teleport animation lasting for too long. If this is the case, how do I shorten that length? If it isn’t, any help to fix this issue is appreciated.

EDIT: Sorry, I found the fix for this problem, and it is in fact a server issue not a client issue.

I had to change c.teleEndAnimation = 0; to c.teleEndAnimation = 1; in PlayerAssistant.java

Read full topic
